Picked up a nice Bat off shoulder on here recently. Looking for Bat on to complete the set. 

PSA graded only. Clean front and back. No creases or very minor. $2,500 range. 

Email me at [url]rsealock@hotmail.com[/url] if you’ve got something that fits the bill.
